Articles.Content:
A wonderful, lighthearted depiction of a kerbal who will never return to his homeland because of the incompetence of the humans. I totally copied the title screen because I’m unoriginal. The jetpack looks like a small child drew it, and space looks splotchy* because I’m too lazy to rub the paper more. Kerbal is slightly too tall, and there are visible wrinkle and erased lines. The engine isn’t even from KSP. That said, I’m a lazy person and this is good enough.

 Note this attitude is why I get bad grades on my essays. 

*is this a word?

Feel free to criticize! (assuming anyone even sees this)

Link: http://imgur.com/EP2OuPe
I don'y see any reason to criticize this work. It is a very nice drawing!
